events.message: I recently ordered a jacket, but I want to request a refund because the size did not fit and I do not want an exchange.
The customer support system has classified this issue under the Refund category based on the refund-related keywords mentioned.
A customer support agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case to ensure quick resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket order. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process your request faster?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket was too small despite ordering my usual size, so I'd prefer a refund.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated the refund process. You should see the refund reflected in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and processing the refund so fast. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the customer's satisfaction with the refund process.
We wanted to follow up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is in order. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this refund support case. Thank you for contacting us.
